name: Surf's Up
overview: Surf's Up is a surfing game set at the annual "Reggie Belafonte Big Z Memorial Surf Off." 8 different characters compete in 24 action-packed races in order to win the Penguin World Surfing Championship. Players will experience the rush and thrills of surfing in exotic surf spots around Pen Gu Island, and can rip it up as one of the characters from the film.
